title: Get Map Unit Key (mukey) grid from SoilWeb Web Coverage Service (WCS) — mukey.wcs
text: aoi area interest (AOI) defined using either Spatial*, RasterLayer, sf, sfc bbox object, list, see details db name gridded map unit key grid access, either 'gNATSGO', 'gSSURGO', 'STATSGO', 'HI_SSURGO', 'PR_SSURGO' (case insensitive) res grid resolution, units meters. native resolution gNATSGO gSSURGO (WCS) 30m; STATSGO (WCS) 300m; Raster Soil Surveys (RSS) 10m resolution. res specified native resolution source used. quiet logical, passed curl::curl_download enable / suppress URL progress bar download.

title: Get Map Unit Key (mukey) grid from SoilWeb Web Coverage Service (WCS) — mukey.wcs
text: SpatRaster (RasterLayer) object containing indexed map unit keys associated raster attribute table try-error request fails. default, spatial classes terra package returned. input object class raster sp packages RasterLayer returned.

title: Get Map Unit Key (mukey) grid from SoilWeb Web Coverage Service (WCS) — mukey.wcs
text: aoi specified one : SpatRaster, Spatial*, RasterLayer, sf, sfc, bbox object, list containing: aoi bounding-box specified (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax) e.g. c(-114.16, 47.65, -114.08, 47.68) crs coordinate reference system BBOX, e.g. 'OGC:CRS84' (EPSG:4326, WGS84 Longitude/Latitude) WCS query parameterized using rectangular extent derived AOI specification, conversion native CRS (EPSG:5070) WCS grids. Databases available WCS can queried using WCS_details(wcs = 'mukey').

text: D.E. Beaudette .G. Brown

title: Get Map Unit Key (mukey) grid from SoilWeb Web Coverage Service (WCS) — mukey.wcs
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(terra)  res <- mukey.wcs(list(aoi = c(-116.7400, 35.2904, -116.7072, 35.3026), crs = "EPSG:4326"),                  db = 'gNATSGO', res = 30)     m <- unique(values(res))  prp <- setNames(   get_SDA_property(     c("ph1to1h2o_r", "claytotal_r"),     "weighted average",     mukeys = m,     top_depth = 0,     bottom_depth = 25,     include_minors = TRUE,     miscellaneous_areas = FALSE   )[, c("mukey", "ph1to1h2o_r", "claytotal_r")],   c("ID",    "pH1to1_0to25", "clay_0to25") )  levels(res) <- prp res2 <- catalyze(res) res2  plot(res2[['pH1to1_0to25']]) } # }

what: Retrieve Soil Series Extent Maps from SoilWeb — seriesExtent
title: Retrieve Soil Series Extent Maps from SoilWeb — seriesExtent
text: function downloads generalized representations soil series extent SoilWeb, derived current SSURGO snapshot. title: Retrieve Soil Series Extent Maps from SoilWeb — seriesExtent
text: D.E. Beaudette

title: Retrieve Soil Series Extent Maps from SoilWeb — seriesExtent
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{      # specify a soil series name   s <- 'magnor'      # return an sf object   x <- seriesExtent(s, type = 'vector')      # return a terra SpatRasters   y <- seriesExtent(s, type = 'raster')      library(terra)   if (!is.null(x) && !is.null(y)) {     x <- terra::vect(x)     # note that CRS are different     terra::crs(x)     terra::crs(y)        # transform vector representation to CRS of raster     x <- terra::project(x, terra::crs(y))        # graphical comparison     par(mar = c(1, 1 , 1, 3))     plot(y, axes = FALSE)     plot(x, add = TRUE)   } } # }

title: Get
text: Look siblings cousins given soil series current fiscal year SSURGO snapshot via SoilWeb. siblings given soil series defined soil components (major minor) share parent map unit named series (major component). Component names filtered using snapshot Soil Classification database ensure valid soil series names included. Cousins siblings siblings. Data sourced SoilWeb maintains copy current SSURGO snapshot. Visualizations soil "siblings"-related concepts can found "Sibling Summary" tab Soil Data Explorer app: https://casoilresource.lawr.ucdavis.edu/sde/. Additional resources: Soil Series Query Functions Soil "Siblings" Tutorial SSSA 2019 Presentation - Mapping Soilscapes Using Soil Co-Occurrence Networks

title: Get
code: siblings(s, only.major = FALSE, component.data = FALSE, cousins = FALSE)

title: Get
text: s character vector, name single soil series, case-insensitive. .major logical, return siblings major components component.data logical, component data siblings (optionally cousins) returned? cousins logical, siblings--siblings (cousins) returned?

title: Get
text: list containing: sib: data.frame containing siblings, major component flag, number co-occurrences sib.data: data.frame containing sibling component data (component.data = TRUE) cousins: data.frame containing cousins, major component flag, number co-occurrences (cousins = TRUE) cousin.data: data.frame containing cousin component data (cousins = TRUE, component.data = TRUE)

what: Simplify Color Data by ID — simplifyColorData
title: Simplify Color Data by ID — simplifyColorData
text: Simplify multiple Munsell color observations associated horizon. function mainly intended processing NASIS pedon/horizon data may may contain multiple colors per horizon/moisture status combination. simplifyColorData "mix" multiple colors associated horizons d, according IDs specified id.var, using "weights" (area percentages) specified wt argument. Note function actually simulate mixture pigments surface, rather, "mixing" approximated via weighted average CIELAB colorspace. simplifyColorData function can applied data sources NASIS careful use id.var wt arguments. However, d must contain Munsell colors split columns named "colorhue", "colorvalue", "colorchroma". addition, moisture state ("Dry" "Moist") must specified column named "colormoistst". Examples: KSSL data soil color mixing tutorial

title: Simplify Color Data by ID — simplifyColorData
code: simplifyColorData(d, id.var = "phiid", wt = "colorpct", bt = FALSE)

title: Simplify Color Data by ID — simplifyColorData
text: d data.frame object, typically returned NASIS, see details id.var character vector name column containing ID unique among horizons d wt character vector name column containing color weights mixing bt logical, mixed sRGB representation soil color transformed closest Munsell chips? performed aqp::col2Munsell()

title: Simplify Color Data by ID — simplifyColorData
text: D.E. Beaudette

title: Simplify Coarse Fraction Data — simplifyArtifactData
text: art data.frame object, typically returned NASIS, see details id.var character vector name column containing ID unique among horizons rf vol.var character vector name column containing coarse fragment volume. Default "fragvol" "huartvol". nullFragsAreZero fragment volumes NULL interpreted 0? (default: TRUE), see details ... Additional arguments passed sieving function (e.g. sieves named numeric containing sieve size thresholds class name) rf data.frame object, typically returned NASIS, see details prefix character vector prefix input msg Identifier data summarized. Default "rock fragment volume" routine also used "surface fragment cover"

title: Simplify Coarse Fraction Data — simplifyArtifactData
text: function mainly intended processing NASIS pedon/component data contains multiple coarse fragment descriptions per horizon. simplifyFragmentData "sieve " coarse fragments USDA classes, split hard para- fragments. Likewise, simplifyArtifactData sieve human artifacts, split total volume "cohesive", "penetrable", "innocuous", "persistent". functions can applied data sources NASIS careful use id.var vol.var arguments. rf must contain rock fragment volumes column "fragvol" (specified vol.var), fragment size (mm) columns "fragsize_l", "fragsize_r", "fragsize_h", fragment cementation class "fraghard" flat/non-flat "fragshp". art must contain artifact volumes column "huartvol" (specified vol.var), fragment size (mm) columns "huartsize_l", "huartsize_r", "huartsize_h", artifact cementation class "huarthard" flat/non-flat "huartshp". Examples: KSSL data

title: Simplify Coarse Fraction Data — simplifyArtifactData

title: Get soilDB User Directory Path — soilDB_user_dir
text: character. One : "data", "config", "cache". Passed tools::R_user_dir(). ... character. Sub-directories. Additional arguments passed file.path() create logical. TRUE (default) directory path created (recursively). remove logical. TRUE contents folder(s) deleted (recursively). Default: FALSE. fsep character. File path separator. Passed file.path() normalizePath(). Default: .Platform$file.sep mustWork logical. Throw error path normalized; passed normalizePath(). Default NA generates warning.

title: Get soilDB User Directory Path — soilDB_user_dir
text: character. File paths within specified soilDB user directory. remove=TRUE result NULL.

title: Get soilDB User Directory Path — soilDB_user_dir
text: directory path exist created (recursively) create=TRUE. Output paths normalized using normalizePath() specified path separator (fsep).

what: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
text: function downloads generalized representation geographic extent single taxon top 4 levels Soil Taxonomy, taxa matching given formative element used Great Group subgroup taxa. Data provided SoilWeb, ultimately sourced current SSURGO snapshot. Data returned raster objects representing area proportion falling within 800m cells. Currently area proportions based major components . Data available CONUS returned using Albers Equal Area / NAD83(2011) coordinate reference system (EPSG: 5070).

title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
code: taxaExtent(   x,   level = c("order", "suborder", "greatgroup", "subgroup"),   formativeElement = FALSE,   timeout = 60,   as_Spatial = getOption("soilDB.return_Spatial", default = FALSE) )

title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
text: x single taxon label (e.g. haploxeralfs) formative element (e.g. pale), case-insensitive level taxonomic level within top 4 tiers Soil Taxonomy, one 'order', 'suborder', 'greatgroup', 'subgroup' formativeElement logical, search using formative elements instead taxon label timeout time willing wait response, seconds as_Spatial Return raster (RasterLayer) classes? Default: FALSE.

title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
text: SpatRaster object (RasterLayer as_Spatial=TRUE)

title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
text: D.E. Beaudette .G. Brown

title: Get SoilWeb 800m Major Component Soil Taxonomy Grids — taxaExtent
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   library(terra)      # soil order   taxa <- 'vertisols'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'order')      # suborder   taxa <- 'ustalfs'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'suborder')      # greatgroup   taxa <- 'haplohumults'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'greatgroup')      # subgroup   taxa <- 'Typic Haploxerepts'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'subgroup')      # greatgroup formative element   taxa <- 'psamm'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'greatgroup', formativeElement = TRUE)      # subgroup formative element   taxa <- 'abruptic'   x <- taxaExtent(taxa, level = 'subgroup', formativeElement = TRUE)      # coarsen for faster plotting   a <- terra::aggregate(x, fact = 5, na.rm = TRUE)      # quick evaluation of the result   terra::plot(a, axes = FALSE) } # }

what: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
text: functions convert coded values returned NASIS SDA factors (e.g. 1 = Alfisols) using metadata tables NASIS. SDA metadata pulled static snapshot soilDB package (/data/metadata.rda).

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
code: uncode(   df,   invert = FALSE,   db = "NASIS",   droplevels = FALSE,   stringsAsFactors = NULL,   dsn = NULL )  code(df, db = NULL, droplevels = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = NULL, dsn = NULL)

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
text: df data.frame invert converts code labels back coded values (FALSE) db label specifying soil database data coming , indicates whether query metadata local NASIS database ("NASIS") use soilDB-local snapshot ("LIMS" "SDA") droplevels logical: indicating whether drop unused levels classifying factors. useful class large number unused classes, can waste space tables figures. stringsAsFactors deprecated dsn Optional: path local SQLite database containing NASIS table structure; default: NULL

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
text: data.frame results.

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
text: functions convert coded values returned NASIS plain text representation. duplicates functionality CODELABEL function found NASIS. function primarily intended used internally soilDB R functions, order minimize need manually convert values. function works iterating column names data frame looking whether match ColumnPhysicalNames found metadata domain tables. matches found columns coded values converted corresponding factor levels. Therefore advisable reuse column names NASIS unless contents match range values format found NASIS. Otherwise uncode() convert values NA. data imported NASIS, metadata tables sourced directly NASIS. data imported SDA NASIS Web Reports, metadata pulled static snapshot soilDB package. Set options(soilDB.NASIS.skip_uncode = TRUE) bypass decoding logic; instance using soilDB NASIS functions custom NASIS snapshots already decoded.

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
text: Stephen Roecker

title: Convert coded values returned from NASIS and SDA queries into human-readable values — uncode
code: # convert column name `fraghard` (fragment hardness) codes to labels uncode(data.frame(fraghard = 1:10)) #>               fraghard #> 1          noncemented #> 2            indurated #> 3  moderately cemented #> 4    strongly cemented #> 5      weakly cemented #> 6     extremely weakly #> 7          very weakly #> 8        very strongly #> 9               weakly #> 10          moderately  # convert column name `fragshp` (fragment shape) labels to codes code(data.frame(fragshp = c("flat", "nonflat"))) #>   fragshp #> 1       1 #> 2       2

title: soilDB 2.8.11 (development)
text: CRAN release: 2025-07-11 Update NASIS metadata data model version 7.4.3 fetchSDA_spatial() geom.src="mlrapolygon" uses new URL DSHub S3 bucket Added "projectsubtype" "milestonetype" "project" set get_NASIS_table_name_by_purpose() Initial phase syntax cleanup affecting many functions

title: soilDB 2.8.10 (2025-04-28)
text: fetchVegdata() add nullFragsAreZero argument (passed get_site_data_from_NASIS_db()) Added soilDB_user_dir() caching local copies data use soilDB functions (#377) Added fetchHWSD() get_HWSD_path() FAO Harmonized World Soil Database (#391) Added get_phroots_from_NASIS_db() getting pedon horizon root information NASIS (#393)

title: soilDB 2.8.9 (2025-04-04)
text: CRAN release: 2025-04-05 soilDB now requires aqp >= 2.1.0 Added get_vegplot_groundsurface_from_NASIS_db() thanks Greg Schmidt (@phytoclast; #373) Added "transectgroundsurfcover" table "vegetation" set get_NASIS_table_name_by_purpose() Added missing fetchNASIS("components") deprecation messages maat_l, maat_r, maat_h, mast_r, ecosite_id, ecosite_name, othervegid, othervegclass columns fetchSDA_spatial(geom.src="mlrapolygon"): uses AWS (S3) source Seek-optimized ZIP file (thanks @jneme910) get_SDA_property() (method "weighted average" "min/max"), get_SDA_hydric(), get_SDA_interpretation() (method "weighted average") now use Common Table Expressions (CTEs) therefore compatible local (SQLite ) data sources

title: soilDB 2.8.8 (2025-02-10)
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-10 fetchSCAN(): Bug fix sensor column contains NA ROSETTA(): now uses HTTPS URL API endpoint fetchNASIS(): Bug fix (now deprecated) pedon_id horizon slot rather site Rebuilt SPC datasets: loafercreek, gopheridge, mineralKing fetchNASISLabData(): use ncsspedonlabdataiid unique pedon ID

title: soilDB 2.8.7 (2025-01-16)
text: CRAN release: 2025-01-16 Several aliases NASIS physical column names deprecated removed next minor release (2.9.x). See https://ncss-tech.github.io/AQP/soilDB/bulletins/2025.01-1-soilDB-NASIS-column-aliases.html details (#369) Added "ecostateid", "ecostatename", "commphaseid", "commphasename” columns site siteobs now joined "vegplot" result. Fixed "site" join used "vegplot" table result. Now using LEFT join add siteecositehistory information Sites without vegetation plots now excluded result change avoids issues unintended duplication records e.g. lab pedons multiple pedons per site observation. Thanks Nathan Roe suggestion. get_vegplot_*() functions use INNER join vegtransect table applicable, records returned vegplots associated transect. Thanks Zach Van Abbema suggestion. createSSURGO(): informative error message export files found import Improved soilDBdata data sets used unit tests fetchNASIS() fetchVegdata() local NASIS instance available Updated NASIS SoilProfileCollection data sets (loafercreek, gopheridge, mineralKing)

title: soilDB 2.8.6 (2024-12-23)
text: fetchNASIS() get_site_data_from_NASIS_db() now return Ecological Site State Community Phase information (ecostatename, ecostateid, commphasename, commphaseid columns) Site Observation table Removed workaround {odbc}/nanoodbc VARCHAR(MAX) columns; now can directly use DBI::dbReadTable() tables via NASIS ODBC connection Fixed error output_path=NULL get_colors_from_NASIS_db() deprecate mixColors argument, add method argument options “dominant”, “mixed”, “none”. New aggregation method "none" returns long format representation color data phcolor table aggregation applied. Added incremental write tabular data table soil survey area, much memory efficient reduces number cointerp rows 75% published SSURGO. Generally, Web Soil Survey exports maximum rule depth 1, custom NASIS exports can “deeper” Updated behavior filename argument conn DBIConnection specified improved overwrite logic Added dissolve_field facilitate creating aggregate geometries "mukey" spatial attribute Added include_tabular argument support omitting tabular data building database TRUE tables, FALSE tables. allows subsets SSURGO data model specified finer user control database contents. Now composite "soil_metadata" table made "areasymbol" column one row per soil survey area, rather one table per soil survey area. compact scales better larger databases.

title: soilDB 2.8.5 (2024-11-04)
text: CRAN release: 2024-11-05 fetchLDM() add support area_type argument local database connections (dsn argument) Improved SCAN, CSCAN, SNOTEL, SNOWLITE station metadata (#61) via @jskovlin Timezone support hourly data requested fetchSCAN() (#184) -ground sensors now returned, instead just first type (#359) Added new help file NASIS database sources; see ?NASISLocalDatabase (#360) get_SDA_*() function updates related consistent parameters miscellaneous areas minor components (#361) fetchSOLUS(): New function downloading data Soil Landscapes United States 100-meter (SOLUS100) soil property maps project repository (#362) fetchNASIS() consistent QC messages output multiple site observations lab samples Updated SoilProfileCollection data sets (loafercreek, gopheridge, mineralKing) aqp 2.1.x object definition recent changes fetchNASIS() (#363)

title: soilDB 2.8.4 (2024-08-17)
text: CRAN release: 2024-08-17 generating gpkg_contents GeoPackage files failed add entries “features” data_type filename argument properly handled cases SDA_query() handle another possible failure point error handling code createStaticNASIS() use odbc::dbListFields() instead odbc::odbcConnectionColumns()

title: soilDB 2.8.3 (2024-06-11)
text: CRAN release: 2024-06-11 ISSR800 authoritative grid system altered slightly ISSR800.wcs() soilColor.wcs() now set color table internally possible updated source data: ISSR800 (FY24) soil color (FY23) Better messaging error Handle try-error result gracefully high-level functions (#352) createSSURGO(): added support creating DuckDB, PostgreSQL, DBI-compatible databases (#352) via conn argument fetchSDA() get_chorizon_from_SDA() concatenate multiple texcl using comma texture group contains multiple texture classes (e.g. stratified textures) (fixes #353) fetchNASIS()/.formatLandformString(): append geomfmod column landscape, landform, microfeature strings present; thanks Gabriel Benitez suggestion fetchNASIS()/get_extended_data_from_NASIS_db(): fix conversion codes labels microrelief fetchSCAN(): fix header format; thanks @dschlaep reporting providing fix

title: soilDB 2.8.2 (2024-04-22)
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-22 Note ISSR800 WCS (ISSR800.wcs() source) still using FY2023/FY2022 data get_SDA_coecoclass() default data returned methods “Dominant Component”, “Dominant Condition” “None” now include localphase column default FALSE backward compatibility/common use cases get_site_data_from_NASIS_db() gains Frost Free Days, MAP, REAP, MAAT, MAST, MSAT, MSST, MWAT, MWST, Parent Material Group Name; thanks Zach Van Abbema suggestion get_site_data_from_NASIS_db(): Add state, county, MLRA areasymbol references ("site_state", "site_county", "site_mlra") get_mapunit_from_NASIS_db(): Add dominant MLRA areasymbol reference column "lmapunit_mlra" get_soilseries_from_NASIS(): replace areasymbol column use relationship-style name "soilseries_typelocst" (minor breaking change) fetchSDA_spatial(): Add support querying mapunit point ("mupoint"), mapunit line ("muline"), special feature point ("featpoint"), special feature line ("featline") mukey featkey, geometry type selectable via geom.src argument SDA_spatialQuery(): Add support querying mapunit point ("mupoint"), mapunit line ("muline"), special feature point ("featpoint"), special feature line ("featline") spatial extent, geometry type selectable via argument simplifyFragmentData() / simplifyArtifactData() efficiency improvement records missing data

title: soilDB 2.8.1 (2024-01-09)
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-09 Default results include "Non-MLRA Soil Survey Area" "MLRA Soil Survey Area". Set NULL filter. Fixed bugs waterDayYear() summarizeSoilTemperature() leap years (#333) Fixed bug data.frame output Requests 5 sites now include call Sys.sleep() conform ISRIC “Fair Use” policy Upgraded SoilProfileCollection spatial promotion aqp 2.0+ Added 10 kPa, 33 kPa 1500 kPa water content estimates default variable sets point grid queries fetchSDA_spatial() gains ability query mapunit delineations Ecological Site ID (.col="ecoclassid") Fixed bug related merging tables/integer data type Fixed bug calculation “assigned” fraction mapunits result negative aggregate component percentages default threshold

title: soilDB 2.8.0 (2023-12-22)
text: CRAN release: 2023-12-22 Minimum {aqp} version set v2.0.2. due changes namespace related aqp::col2Munsell(), “encourage” users update efficient routines provided {aqp} 2+ (haven’t already), prepare future updates 2.x series. Fix bugs get_SDA_interpretation() dsn refers local SQLite source concatenation reason string wide_reason=TRUE Breaking change: Now uses standard SSURGO layer names spatial data (e.g. "mupolygon" rather "soilmu_a"). Creates indices foreign keys columns important data analysis, dramatically improving performance standard queries SQLite sources. Now works properly STATSGO data sets individual states CONUS. Previously tabular data transferred spatial data . downloadSSURGO() gains db argument gives ability download STATSGO state US Web Soil Survey. Thanks Meghan Krueger suggestion. get_SDA_property(): weighted average/dominant component numeric methods now return mukey first column position; parity get_SDA* methods recently updated/already , making easier use columns raster attribute tables via terra::set.levels() fetchNASIS(lab=TRUE) fixed bug multiple phlabresults records present single horizon, one missing bottom depth. Thanks Meyer Bohn (@MollicMeyer) reporting. SoilProfileCollection objects now include time stamp metadata, accessed : metadata(x)$created (#235) Added area_type argument fetchLDM() non-SSA area queries (#328) Added grid argument fetchSoilGrids() downloading Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFF subsets spatial extent (#329) fetchOSD() now automatically batches requests sets 100 series, allowing arbitrarily large requests made (#239)

title: soilDB 2.7.10 (2023-11-16)
text: CRAN release: 2023-11-16 fetchSDA_spatial() gains geom.src="mlrapolygon" obtaining Major Land Resource Area (MLRA) polygon boundaries. using geometry source x vector MLRARSYM (MLRA Symbols). geometry source MLRA Geographic Database v5.2 (2022) (yet) part Soil Data Access. Instead SDA, GDAL utilities used read zipped ESRI Shapefile remote URL: https://www.nrcs.usda.gov/sites/default/files/2022-10/MLRA_52_2022.zip. Therefore, additional fetchSDA_spatial() arguments currently supported MLRA geometry source. future mlrapolygon table may added SDA (analogous mupolygon sapolygon), function updated accordingly time. Web coverage services related raster attribute tables provided SoilWeb (mukey.wcs() etc.) now using SoilWeb load-balancer URL get_SDA_coecoclass() gains method="" aggregating information ecological sites related components. method performs condition-based aggregation ecological site condition map unit, producing “wide” data.frame result many columns needed portray site conditions. fetchLDM() gains new argument supplying custom SQL clause selecting sites interest. example: fetchLDM(= "CASE corr_name NULL LOWER(corr_name) ELSE LOWER(samp_name) END = 'musick'")

title: soilDB 2.7.9 (2023-09-01)
text: method="extent" method calculates bounding rectangle method="convexhull" calculates convex hull method="union" returns MULTIPOLYGON method="collection" returns GEOMETRYCOLLECTION

title: soilDB 2.7.9 (2023-09-01)
text: Bug fix get_vegplot_transpoints_from_NASIS_db(); using wrong record ID transect points get_NASIS_table_name_by_purpose() now includes "pointplantcoverdetails", "plantprodquadratdetails" "vegetation" table purpose group

title: soilDB 2.7.8 (2023-08-29)
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-29 Added new SoilWeb “Web Coverage Service” vignette (https://ncss-tech.github.io/soilDB/articles/wcs-ssurgo.html) related creating thematic maps using grids mapunit keys SoilWeb aggregated tabular data Soil Data Access. get_SDA_*() functions now return mukey values first column mukey.wcs() gains 30m gridded version Hawaii Puerto Rico SSURGO data via db="HI_SSURGO" db="PR_SSURGO", respectively. get_vegplot_data_from_NASIS_db(): now uses LEFT join plant table empty records can diagnosed; thanks @natearoe suggestion Added new NASIS query functions vegetation transect point quadrat details: get_vegplot_prodquadrats_from_NASIS_db() get_vegplot_transpoints_from_NASIS_db()

title: soilDB 2.7.8 (2023-08-29)
text: get_SDA_property(method="Dominant Component (Numeric)") now includes minors default, fixing issues STATSGO mapunits major components flagged. (@dylanbeaudette) get_component_data_from_NASIS_db(): removed duplicated hydricrating column, also now includes climate columns standard names. continuation idea custom aliases standard NASIS columns deprecated (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/242) .pickBestEcosite() now considers record_when_last_updated lieu correlation date; stabilizes sort order SQLite snapshot v.s. NASIS local database sources (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/295) get_component_from_GDB(): fixes batching component geomorphic description parent material group get_mapunit_from_SDA(): handle possibility mapunit-level SDA query failure

title: soilDB 2.7.7 (2023-03-10)
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-10

title: soilDB 2.7.7 (2023-03-10)
text: fetchNASIS(="pedons") get_site_data_from_NASIS_db() now return siteobsiid column (@natearoe) mukey.wcs() gains experimental gridded STATSGO layer (300m) Add get_NASIS_table_metadata() returning information columns NASIS tables. simplifyFragment/ArtifactData(): downgrade warnings get_cosoilmoist_from_SDA(): mukey cokey now included duplicates=TRUE; thanks @andypaolucci catching fetchSoilGrids() Add SpatVector coercion input locations (already supported sf/sp classes) Add handling messages API erroneous input Add fetchNASIS("pedons") columns vignette Add get_NASIS_table_metadata() optional argument include_description get_NASIS_metadata() get_NASIS_column_metadata() get_SDA_cosurfmorph() + get_SDA_pmgroupname(): support including excluding misc. areas via miscellaneous_areas argument get_site_data_from_NASIS_db(): Omit “multiple horizontal datums” warning Remove calculated X/Y long/lat + add proper NASIS alias long/lat Add siteothvegclass id/name - add tables default lookup/site sets

title: soilDB 2.7.7 (2023-03-10)
text: dbQueryNASIS(..., close=TRUE) now calls dbDisconnect() .exit() (ensuring connections get closed error) fetchSCAN(): 2x requests timeseries argument specified Account results (e.g. year = 1800) Bug fix vectorization daily + hourly data requested downloadSSURGO(): Handle SDA_query() invalid syntax clause Fix include_template=FALSE createSSURGO() Attribute tables now added gpkg_contents output filename GeoPackage Fix .get_comonth_from_SDA() Fix selected set (SS argument) get_ecosite_history_from_NASIS_db() get_site_data_from_NASIS_db() get_SDA_pmgroupname: return NA (“NULL”) empty/missing pmgroupname simplify=TRUE SDA_spatialQuery(): geomIntersection=TRUE db="SAPOLYGON" now correctly labels areasymbol column (previously mukey) match geomIntersection=FALSE SDA schema Bounding box extent polygons now calculated SpatRaster (SpatVector) input

title: soilDB 2.7.6 (2022-11-28)
text: CRAN release: 2022-12-02 references soilDB.env replaced function returns environment object (get_soilDB_env()); thanks @MollicMeyer identifying problem #277. object used exported unintentionally omitted NAMESPACE; fixed. fetchNASIS(lab=TRUE) bug fix related many:1 relationships lab samples morphologic horizons -missing columns logical datatype (#277) Added get_SRI() fetchSRI() functions accessing USFS Region 6 Soil Resource Inventory information https://ecoshare.info/; thanks @joshualerickson contribution (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/pull/274) fetchLDM() now sets horizon designation metadata like fetch* functions return SoilProfileCollection objects (@dylanbeaudette) mukey.wcs() fix spurious warnings occasionally given due minor differences (rounding) grid dimensions {curl} moved Suggests Imports simplfyFragmentData() alias simplifyFragmentData() removed (@infotroph)

title: soilDB 2.7.5 (2022-10-17)
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-18 Updates SSURGO File Geodatabase functions (fetchGDB() related) @smroecker Added soilColor.wcs() access web coverage service soil color various depths @dylanbeaudette waterDayYear(): fix CRAN different timezones; now defaults tz="UTC" #268 summarizeSoilTemperature(): set default timezone tz="UTC" Fix uncode() pre-decoded values ChoiceName ChoiceLabel overlap #273 Fix NASISChoiceList() related #273 get_soilseries_from_NASIS(): Remove areaacres obterm #272 @smroecker Fix get_OSD(..., fix_ocr_errors = TRUE) empty typical profile #271 @dylanbeaudette fetchNASIS() drops non-representative additional dropNotRepresentative/dropAdditional set (@natearoe) Fix .POSIXct() R 4.3+; #265 Fix “status ’SSL connect error” fetchKSSL() functions download JSON (@kramdog) Now uses standard soilDB {curl} handle, includes longer timeout ssl_verifyhost=0 Fixes compatibility {jsonlite} >1.8.1 now uses {base} rather {curl} Update row count expectations end FY22 SSURGO refresh

title: soilDB 2.7.4 (2022-09-30)
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-30 uncode() replaced \(x) syntax inadvertently included recent update fix R < 4.1 compatibility; thanks @cbrueffer catching (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/262)! get_SDA_property() fixes weighted average method (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/229, https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/261) fetchOSD() now automatically encodes horizon distinctness codes default depth offsets, stored hz-level attr: hzd

title: soilDB 2.7.3 (2022-08-19)
text: CRAN release: 2022-08-19 get_SDA_property() methods now support miscellaneous_areas argument. defaults FALSE methods previously implemented –aware queries using "Dominant Component" "Dominant Condition" (previously respond miscellaneous_areas) may number rows result reduced due omission miscellaneous land types. unexpected undesired, please use miscellaneous_areas=TRUE. (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/257) Adds get_NASIS_metadata() helper method get_NASIS_column_metadata() new tools working uncode(), factors NASIS metadata cached package. Bug fix get_cosoilmoist_from_SDA(); thanks Monika Shea @monikashea reporting problem (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/253) fetchNASIS_report() now works output "get_site_from_NASIS" report (useful site records without associated pedons) createSSURGO() gains arguments quiet include_spatial toggle messages inclusion spatial data created SQLite database, respectively downloadSSURGO() now handles queries sacatalog return results gracefully get_OSD(): Add fix_ocr_errors argument result='json' fix common optical character recognition errors associated horizon designations colors (NOTE: fix depths) fetchSCAN() gains timeseries argument support batch downloads hourly data. Additional arguments (...) passed raw request, allowing parameters sent request modified needed, bypassing batch functionality. similar req argument syntax used earlier versions function, deprecated time now. Thanks Matthew Morriss raising discussion item @morrismc99 (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/discussions/260). {curl} moved Suggests Imports; curl::curl_download() now used instead utils::download.file() seems handle SSL certificates better networks.

title: soilDB 2.7.2 (2022-06-24)
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-27 fetchNASIS("components'): Fix refactor ( breaking change 2.7.1, introduced bug/inconsistency) recent change; duplicates argument now required merge data mapunit/legend tables (many:1 relationships legend/mapunit datamapunit possible). 2.7.1 possibly incomplete mapunit/legend tables joined SoilProfileCollection result (tables populated selected set/local DB). change historic (<=2.7.0) default behavior. Thanks @dylanbeaudette suggesting use get_component_correlation_data_from_NASIS_db() . Several fixes Roxygen documentation (notably ROSETTA() various NASIS web report related functions) missing @export tags. Several previously-exported functions missed explicitly exported new Roxygen-generate NAMESPACE. unintentional omissions 2.7.1 NAMESPACE resolved. Fixes old bug fetchSDA()/get_chorizon_from_SDA() related LEFT OUTER versus RIGHT JOIN chtexture table

title: soilDB 2.7.1 (2022-06-10)
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-10 get_SDA_coecoclass() better handling NULL ecoclassref; support filtering ecoclasstypename; not_assigned_value now applies ecoclassname, ecoclasstypename ecoclassref columns addition ecoclassid; Thanks Andy Paolucci Jason Nemecek. Also, added additional columns legend/mapunit tables (areasymbol, lkey, muname). fetchNASIS(="components") now returns mapunit legend information (loaded local NASIS database); results now contain mustatus repdmu can used remove components additional mapunits non-representative data mapunits; thanks Nathan Roe Convert UTF-8 strings us_ss_timeline result ASCII SDA_query(): Fixed POST request produce unhandled errors network failure (now returns try-error like error-causing code) SDA_query(): event syntax error, error contents now returned message, warning. uncode() code() now work data.table tibble objects. Various fixes tests error handling code reduce likelihood thrown errors network problems missing suggested packages.

title: soilDB 2.7.0 (2022-05-18)
text: CRAN release: 2022-05-18 Dropped imports sp raster means soilDB longer requires soon--retire rgdal package. (breaking change) Classes packages (e.g. sf, SpatRaster) returned default rather Spatial*DataFrame RasterLayer sp raster. fetchSDA_spatial() SDA_spatialQuery() gain as_Spatial argument; TRUE equivalent (backward compatible) sp raster data types returned. Alternately, may set options(soilDB.return_Spatial=TRUE) mukey.wcs() ISSR800.wcs() bug fix instances target extent miscalculated, resulting slight differences requested resolution (res argument) result. mukey.wcs() gains new possible data source db="RSS" accesses Web Coverage Service containing grids Raster Soil Surveys United States. See: https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/pull/229 details changed. (breaking change) rmHzErrors argument now defaults FALSE. Please let us know allowing horizon errors results unexpected behavior can repair various interfaces rely errors present. See aqp::checkHzDepthLogic() information types things used result profiles removed results guidelines fix. Added several new columns plotplantinventory table get_vegplot_species_from_NASIS_db() result; thanks Zachary Van Abbema suggestion feedback db argument uncode() deprecated. Now, code() uncode() can use ChoiceName /ChoiceLabel coding decoding ChoiceValue data sources. Rock fragment artifact sieving now uses <76mm upper boundary gravel fraction, related QC message removed “cosurfmorphgc” summarizes “geomposmntn”, “geomposhill”, “geomposflats”, “geompostrce” “cosurfmorphhpp” summarizes “hillslopeprof” “cosurfmorphss” summarizes “shapeacross”, “shapedown”, concatenated “surfaceshape” Several fixes logic get_SDA_property() method="weighted average" include_minors=TRUE/miscellaneous_areas=TRUE, thanks Andy Paolucci Dylan Beaudette testing providing feedback queries. get_SDA_*() methods (except get_SDA_metrics()) now support input custom clause lieu mukeys/areasymbols arguments gain dsn argument specifying local SQLite database DBIConnection. Added downloadSSURGO() downloading/extraction SSURGO data survey area Web Soil Survey. Exports can obtained via downloadSSURGO(), NASIS downloaded sources https://datagateway.nrcs.usda.gov/GDGHome_DirectDownLoad.aspx.

title: soilDB 2.6.15 (2022-04-13)
text: CRAN release: 2022-04-14 Default TRUE mixes colors based reported color percentage via estimateColorMixture(). FALSE returns dominant color moisture state, first record cases without colorpct populated. Added taxreaction taxfamhahatmatcl extended taxonomic information Added new option (soilDB.NASIS.skip_uncode) bypass uncode() NASIS functions (mostly used debugging special database instances come pre-decoded) instance fetchNASIS(="components") local database connection left open fixed Added fetchLDM() function access Kellogg Soil Survey Lab Data Mart via Soil Data Access local SQLite snapshot (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/pull/243) Added get_SDA_metrics() accessing usage metrics Soil Data Access, Web Soil Survey Lab Data Mart. Thanks Jason Nemecek submitting base SQL query get_SDA_interpretation(method = "dominant condition") now includes total_comppct_* columns reflecting summed component percentage dominant condition Updated metadata SCAN sites missing pedlabsampnum (KSSL Pedon Sample ID)

title: soilDB 2.6.14 (2022-03-15)
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-15 waterYearDay() bug fix specific (sub-daily) date-time formats fetchSCAN() better handling empty results multi-site queries fetchNASIS("pedons") longer includes pmweathering fetchNASIS("components") longer includes ecositeorigin New Component Ecological Site attributes added Default behavior NASIS domains return character labels rather coded factors Use NASISDomainsAsFactor(TRUE) toggle package option soilDB.NASIS.DomainsAsFactor

title: soilDB 2.6.13 (2022-01-29)
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-31 fetchSDA_spatial now supports .col "areaname", "mlraoffice", "mouagencyresp"; thanks suggestion Jay Skovlin fetchNASIS fix multiple site observation records surface fragments; thanks bug report Brianna Wegner waterYearDay() use format timezone start date conversion fetchNASIS fix ="components", SS=FALSE queries NASIS local database present (e.g. SQLite source) Update NASIS_table_column_keys dataset NASIS primary foreign keys table name include many tables fetchVegdata() longer errors child table queries unless site/site observation/vegetation plot records missing fetchOSD(extended=TRUE) now returns element "NCCPI" containing National Commodity Crop Production Index summaries. values returned quantiles 1, 5, 25, 50, 75, 95, 99% levels SSURGO components compname matching series irrigated non-irrigated condition.

title: soilDB 2.6.12 (2022-01-07)
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-08 get_SDA_property() now works mixed component horizon-level properties; thanks Matthieu Stigler bug report Added get_SDV_legend_elements() fetching parsing XML Soil Data Viewer / Web Soil Survey-style symbol themes soil interpretations Soil Data Access fetchNASIS() pedon component geomorphic summaries now include columns landscape, microfeature, microrelief, 2D/3D morphometry, slope shape fetchNASIS('pedons') now uses simplifyFragmentData() surface fragments

title: soilDB 2.6.11 (2021-12-21)
text: fetchSDA() handle NULL component-level results informative error fetchSDA() now () returns mapunit/legend-level information via get_mapunit_from_NASIS() createStaticNASIS() queries SQLite NASIS snapshots now preserve date/time using RSQLite 2.2.4+ via extended_types=TRUE argument dbConnect() get_soilseries_from_NASIS() now returns soiltaxclasslastupdated date/time stores year calculated column soiltaxclassyearlastupdated Added several tables thematic groups get_NASIS_table_name_by_purpose() fetchOSD() gains surface shape proportions extended shape_across shape_down tables SDA_spatialQuery() ='mukey' now works db='STATSGO' Added metadata loafercreek, gopheridge mineralKing waterYearDay() pass format argument POSIX time conversion

title: soilDB 2.6.10 (2021-12-14)
text: CRAN release: 2021-12-15 waterDayYear() .formatDates() allow optional format tz argument; used consistent POSIX time conversion tests date/time granularity finer one day fetchSDA() extensions better handling components horizon data SDA_spatialQuery() processSDA_WKT() fully use {sf}, replacing {sp} contexts SDA_spatialQuery() gains argument byFeature use multiple single-feature queries combine results unique feature ID specified idcol argument. allows specific feature intersection results without secondary spatial overlay polygons (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/222) dbConnectNASIS() longer requires NASIS credentials option set dsn argument specified. Rebuilt loafercreek, gopheridge mineralKing latest fetchNASIS() results.

title: soilDB 2.6.9 (2021-12-02)
text: CRAN release: 2021-12-03 Replaced functionality using {plyr}/{reshape2} {base}/{data.table} processSDA_WKT(): replaced {rgeos} {wk} {sf} SDA_spatialQuery(): added query_string argument get_SDA_property(): fixes MIN/MAX aggregation (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/219) get_component_from_SDA(): fragment size thresholds now conform new (clarified) NSSH definitions

title: soilDB 2.6.8 (2021-11-05)
text: fetchNASIS() upgrades: use data.table base internally data aggregation fetchNASIS("components") now “sieves” rock fragments human artifacts using routines pedons; respects nullFragsAreZero argument fetchKSSL(..., returnGeochemicalData = TRUE) safely returns 0-length data.frame data available

title: soilDB 2.6.7 (2021-10-27)
text: Removed several packages Suggests: {gridExtra}, {ggplot2}, {viridisLite}, {mapview}, {rasterVis} get_OSD(): Handle “NA” type conversion JSON results convert spaces underscores file names needed fetchSCAN(): graceful handling timeout converted {plyr} {data.table}; (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/161, https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/184) get_EDIT_ecoclass_by_geoUnit(): graceful handling timeout get_SDA_muaggatt(): add query_string argument parity “SSURGO demand” / get_SDA_*() functions

title: soilDB 2.6.6 (2021-09-24)
text: Default get_SDA_pmgroupname() "dominant component", now also supports "dominant condition" "none". Default get_SDA_hydric() map unit level aggregation components assigns new classes ; now supports "dominant component", "dominant condition" "none"

title: soilDB 2.6.5 (2021-08-19)
text: CRAN release: 2021-08-21 API calls return geometry projected coordinates (AEA/NAD83) now use ESPG:5070 instead EPSG:6350

title: soilDB 2.6.4 (2021-08-06)
text: fetchNASIS(="pedons") now supports fill=TRUE argument just like ="components" include pedons horizon records createStaticNASIS(): column order match NASIS, even data types require reorder ODBC driver Corrected conversion factor used predicted nitrogen values (conversion cg/kg g/kg) Corrected conversion factor used uncertainty bdod nitrogen (SoilGrids uncertainty layer always uses factor 10 create integers) Improved error handling Added progress verbose arguments text progress bar additional message output Added support {sf} {sp} POINT geometry inputs Add get_SDA_coecoclass() SOD-style method mapunit/component level summaries ecological site vegetation class information

title: soilDB 2.6.3 (2021-07-22)
text: CRAN release: 2021-07-23 careful use CAST(): unknown datatypes may correctly interpreted previous column classes incorrectly guessed type.convert() may changed (e.g. component.wei) SDA_spatialQuery() can now used return soil survey area symbols geometry using ="areasymbol" ="sapolygon", respectively Added new columns soil classification (“SC”) table result get_soilseries_from_NASIS(); now including taxonomic mineralogy class may contain multiple parts series strongly contrasting control sections Now supports: Dominant Condition, Min, Max, Dominant Component, Weighted Average Add query_string argument (default: FALSE). Set TRUE skip submitting query SDA, instead returning string query sent instead data.frame result Remove ISNULL(x, 0) logic affected weighted averages presence missing data Conditional calculation horizon weights considering NULL values requested properties (unique weights property) New default argument include_minors=FALSE includes components majcompflag = 'Yes' result New default argument miscellaneous_areas=FALSE removes miscellaneous land types compkind values result Organic bedrock layers longer removed “Weighted Average”, “MIN” “MAX” aggregations get_SDA_interpretation: added argument not_rated_value default value NA set “rated”” values across methods/queries. backwards compatibility original SQL use not_rated_value = 99.0 Standardizing MUKEY column name (keys) lowercase results informative error messages bad input / arguments inconsistent specified method Thanks @hammerly pointed weighted averaging NASIS phlabresults wasn’t working expected highlighting improvements (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/192) get_OSD() TXT HTML formats now supported (addition JSON) common function interface Added get_NASIS_table_key_by_name() get_NASIS_fkey_by_name(), get_NASIS_pkeyref_by_name(), get_NASIS_pkey_by_name(), get_NASIS_table_name_by_purpose() methods helping get information primary/foreign keys thematic groups NASIS tables (useful creating SQLite/external snapshots NASIS tables) get_mapunit_from_NASIS(), get_legend_from_NASIS() get_lmuaoverlap_from_NASIS() now works “MLRA Survey Area” areatypename longer limited constraints legendsuituse mustatus

title: soilDB 2.6.2 (2021-05-14)
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-16 “Formative elements” derived dictionary provided {SoilTaxonomy} package (https://cran.r-project.org/package=SoilTaxonomy) example: taxaExtent("abruptic", level = 'subgroup', formativeElement = TRUE) get 800m grid (SSURGO data CONUS) showing extent taxa “abruptic” subgroup-level taxon name fetchNASIS(="pedons") result now contains "taxclname" (full family-level taxon name) field NASIS pedon table; value calculated based contents petaxhistory child table get_SDA_interpretation get_SDA_property now support aggregation method="NONE" allowing returning properties, classes ratings individual components horizons (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/pull/181) ISSR800.wcs mukey.wcs now return result inherits try-error (message) Web Coverage Service query fails

title: soilDB 2.6.1 (2021-04-07)
text: CRAN release: 2021-04-18 Connections local NASIS various MS Access databases now use DBI odbc, replacing RODBC New methods dbConnectNASIS dbQueryNASIS NASIS access read-credentials, fetching query results, closing DBIConnection upon completion Default dsn = NULL uses "nasis_local" ODBC connection local NASIS SQL Server Horizon depth logic checking now done aqp::checkHzDepthLogic(), powered {data.table} get_SDA_property, get_SDA_interpretation, get_SDA_muaggatt, get_SDA_hydric, get_SDA_pmgroupname

title: soilDB 2.6.0 (2021-02-18)
text: OSDquery gets new argument (everything) searching entire document fetchNASIS(..., rmHzErrors=TRUE) – spurious removals data due missing “extended” records. fetchNASIS now uses aqp::horizons<- building minimal SoilProfileCollection NASIS site horizon tables. allows aqp integrity methods trigger needed–preventing unintentional re-ordering removals “valid” horizon data.

title: soilDB 2.5.9 (2021-01-26)
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-26 HenryTimeLine moved {sharpshootR} package new functions mukey.wcs() ISSR800.wcs() hitting web coverage service (WCS) gSSURGO, gNATSGO, ISSR-800 grids new function ROSETTA() accessing new ROSETTA model API (c/o Todd Skaggs, USDA-ARS) fetchOSD(..., extended=TRUE) gains geographically associated soils, parsed OSD (thanks AGB) fetchSDA_spatial now can return soil survey area polygons using geom.src = "sapolygon" x vector area symbols (areasymbol) legend keys (lkey). sapolygon results, method add.field arguments work mupolygon, now geometries can returned fields legend table. fetchSDA_spatial now can return STATSGO gsmmupolygon geometry db = "STATSGO"; data linked mapunit (national) legend just like mupolygon.

title: soilDB 2.5.8 (2020-10-20)
text: CRAN release: 2020-10-21 fetchNASIS / soilDB:::.rockFragmentSieve now uses fragment RV, soilDB:::.sieve uses < operator (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/1) fetchKSSL(..., returnMorphologicData=TRUE) now returns redoximorphic features horizon new function taxaExtent returns 800m gridded taxonomic grids CONUS seriesExtent can now return 800m gridded series extents CONUS SDA_spatialQuery can now retrieve SSURGO STATSGO geometry c/o dschlaep (https://github.com/ncss-tech/soilDB/issues/141) new import: data.table; beginning implement data.table-aware methods aqp soilDB

title: soilDB 2.5.7 (2020-09-03)
text: add fetchGDB querying tabular data SSURGO/gNATSGO/STATSGO File Geodatabases add get_NOAA_GHCND() get_NOAA_stations_nearXY() batch queries NOAA Daily Climate Data (requires free API token) bug fix fetchSDA_spatial chunk.size > 1 resulting duplicate data result major improvements fetchSDA_spatial handle queries exceed JSON Serialization Limit add fetchSoilGrids point data queries SoilGrids v2 API SoilProfileCollection output fetchKSSL(..., returnGeochemicalData=TRUE) now returns geochemical, optical XRD/thermal data

title: soilDB 2.5.6 (2020-06-16)
text: bug fixes fetchKSSL related vectorization, arguments vectorized except bbox KSSL_VG_model output cleaned-, now returns phi -> theta function
